TopicTitle: Duna Investigator - Yet Another Curiosity semi-replica / homage

Articles.Content:
A little something I've put together. Ive had the screenshots on my hard drive for a while now (along with a number of others from various missions I've run), but I'm a bit slow on getting things really rolling. It's yet another Curiosity-inspired Duna rover, although the orbiter-lander setup also has shades of Viking as well.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hope y'all like it. I'll probably post a few other mission reports of a similar nature in the near future, some more up-to-date than others.
I like this album format. Driven the rover much?

A fair bit. It handles alright, provided you keep an eye on your speed as you're going downhill. I think one time I got it coasting over 25 m/s, upon which I hit a bump that shattered it into tiny pieces... Thank goodness for quicksaves!
I'm surprised you got the little wheels up to 25m/s without breaking in the first place.
That might've been what did it, actually. I wouldn't be surprised.
